code: export var CHANGE_LANGUAGE="change_language";export var ADD_LANGUAGE="add_language";export var changeLanguageActionCreator=function changeLanguageActionCreator(languageCode){return{type:CHANGE_LANGUAGE,payload:languageCode};};export var addLanguageActionCreator=function addLanguageActionCreator(name,code){return{type:ADD_LANGUAGE,payload:{name:name,code:code}};};
